subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Adam Henrique scored off a wild scramble in front of Rangers goalie Henrik Lundqvist 1 minute 3 seconds into overtime, sending the Devils to the Stanley Cup finals against the Los Angeles Kings.
snippet: Adam Henrique scored off a wild scramble in front of Rangers goalie Henrik Lundqvist 1 minute 3 seconds into overtime, sending the Devils to the Stanley Cup finals against the Los Angeles Kings.
